name: Kids Puzzles (itch)
description:
Kids Puzzles

How to play by clicking on the image one gets 1 point or by clicking on the same image close together there are 3 get 3 points and a score of 25 while to play the next level up needed is a lot of points at the bottom center.

Level 1: 250 points with a time of 450 seconds

Level 2: 450 points with a time of 250 seconds

Level 3: 550 points with a time of 200 seconds

Final: 3250 points with a time of 750 seconds. Total Score 7600 with 3000 seconds (50 minutes)

Size: 8.0M. Current Version: 3.0. Requires Android: 5.0 and up
